inscription:
Inscription
in brown ink, recto: [Coiffure (Argus) et Turban de Mr. Beauvais. Robe garnier de guipure de Mr. Doncet, Robe des Mins d'Opigez, Cotume de Diapier, Cassolette a Parfums de Guerlin, Lambrequins de Maigret.]
medium: Graphite and watercolor heightened with gouache on cream wove paper
portfolio: From La Mode, Paris, (1829-1854), for the June 8, 1839 plate
title: Two Women Escorted by a Man
